com.foreach.across.core.events

Class AcrossContextBootstrappedEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • org.springframework.context.ApplicationEvent
        • com.foreach.across.core.events.AcrossLifecycleEvent
          • com.foreach.across.core.events.AcrossContextBootstrappedEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AcrossEvent, Serializable

    public final class AcrossContextBootstrappedEvent
extends AcrossLifecycleEvent
    Event published after the AcrossContext has bootstrapped. That means full initialization has happened: all modules are started and all installers have been executed, including those registered InstallerPhase.AfterContextBootstrap.

    Source of this event will be the root ApplicationContext of the Across context or its parent ApplicationContext if it has one (which is usually the case).

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
